title: Furious mum records moment man drove up to her empty wheelie bins and fills them with rubbish
text:
A furious mother from New South Wales has recorded the moment a bin bandit drives up to her recently emptied wheelie bin and fills it with trash before driving away.

Victoria Prentice, from Byron Bay, filmed the moment a dark-coloured sedan pulled up next to her driveway on Wednesday evening.

The footage shows a man getting out of the passenger seat of the car before retrieving a large plastic rubbish bag from the boot and dumping it in the wheelie bin.

He then does the same with a second container of rubbish.

'Caught on camera - jerk. Thanks very much for dumping your rubbish in our empty bin today. Very annoyed,' the woman captioned the video posted to Facebook.

The video sparked a flood of comments. Some people thought the man was rude while others said at least he wasn't littering.

'Annoying because the bins had just been emptied,' one person said.

'Ya gotta admit that's hilarious. I'd be annoyed but give them credit for not dumping it in the gutter somewhere,' another person said.

'It would be good if there were dumpsters that the public could use,' a third added.

While it is considered rude, using someone else's bin is not illegal.

However it is best to check with your local council as they may have rules in place.
